00044     template<class TYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00045     void add(const viennacl::matrix<TYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat1, 
00046              const viennacl::matrix<TYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat2,
00047              viennacl::matrix<TYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & result,
00048              unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00049     {
00050       assert(mat1.rows() == mat2.rows());
00051       assert(mat1.columns() == mat2.columns());
00052       result.resize(mat1.rows(), mat1.columns());
00053 
00054       unsigned int size = std::min(mat1.internal_size(), mat2.internal_size());
00055       unsigned int pos = 0;
00056       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init();
00057       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.setArgument(pos++, mat1.handle());
00058       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.setArgument(pos++, mat2.handle());
00059       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00060       viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.setArgument(pos++, size);
00061 
00062       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00063         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.start1D();
00064       else
00065         viennacl::linalg::kernels::vector<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::add.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069     // A * x
00078     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00079     viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT>,
00080                                 const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00081                                 op_prod > prod_impl(const viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat, 
00082                                                     const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00083                                                     unsigned int NUM_THREADS)
00084     {
00085       return viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT>,
00086                                          const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00087                                          op_prod >(mat, vec);
00088     }
00089     
00099     template<class TYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00100     void prod_impl(const viennacl::matrix<TYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & matrix, 
00101                     const viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00102                           viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & result, 
00103                     unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00104     {
00105       assert(matrix.size2() == vec.size());
00106       result.resize(matrix.size1());
00107 
00108       unsigned int pos = 0;
00109       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, matrix.handle());
00110       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00111       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00112       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, matrix.internal_size2());
00113       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00114       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.size());
00115       
00116       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00117         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.start1D();
00118       else
00119         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<TYPE,ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00120     }
00121     
00122     // trans(A) * x
00131     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00132     viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT>,
00133                                 const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00134                                 op_prod > prod_impl(const viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & proxy, 
00135                                                     const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00136                                                     unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00137     {
00138       return viennacl::vector_expression<const viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT>,
00139                                          const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00140                                          op_prod >(proxy, vec);
00141     }
00142 
00145     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00146     void prod_impl(const viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00147                     const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00148                           viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & result,
00149                     unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00150     {
00151       trans_prod_impl(mat.get_matrix(), vec, result, NUM_THREADS);
00152     }
00153     
00163     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00164     void trans_prod_impl(const viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat,
00165                           const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00166                                 viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & result,
00167                           unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00168     {
00169       assert(mat.size1() == vec.size());  //remember: mat is transposed!
00170       result.resize(mat.size2());
00171 
00172       unsigned int pos = 0;
00173       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00174       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00175       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00176       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.internal_size2());
00177       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.size());
00178       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.size());
00179       
00180       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00181         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.start1D();
00182       else
00183         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE,ALIGNMENT>::trans_vec_mul.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00184     }
00185 
00193     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00194     viennacl::outer_prod_proxy<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> outer_prod(const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec1, 
00195                                                                         const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec2)
00196     {
00197       return viennacl::outer_prod_proxy<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>(vec1, vec2);
00198     }

00211     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00212     void rank_1_update(viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat1, 
00213                        const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec1, 
00214                        const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec2, 
00215                        unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00216     {
00217       assert(mat1.size1() == vec1.size());
00218       assert(mat1.size2() == vec2.size());
00219 
00220       unsigned int pos = 0;
00221       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, mat1.handle());
00222       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec1.handle());
00223       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec2.handle());
00224       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, mat1.internal_size2());
00225       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec1.size());
00226       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec2.size());
00227 
00228       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00229         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00230                                                                                        viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00231       else
00232         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::rank1_update.start1D(NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00233     }

00246     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00247     void scaled_rank_1_update(viennacl::matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & mat1,
00248                               SCALARTYPE val,
00249                               const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec1, 
00250                               const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & vec2, 
00251                               unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00252     {
00253       assert(mat1.size1() == vec1.size());
00254       assert(mat1.size2() == vec2.size());
00255 
00256       unsigned int pos = 0;
00257       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, mat1.handle());
00258       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, val);
00259       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec1.handle());
00260       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec2.handle());
00261       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, mat1.internal_size2());
00262       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec1.size());
00263       viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.setArgument(pos++, vec2.size());
00264 
00265       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00266         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group(),
00267                                                                                               viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group());
00268       else
00269         viennacl::linalg::kernels::matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::scaled_rank1_update.start1D(NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00270     }

00275     //v = A * x
00280     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00281     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00282     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00283     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator=(const viennacl::vector_expression< const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00284                                                                                           const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00285                                                                                           viennacl::op_prod> & proxy) 
00286     {
00287       // check for the special case x = A * x
00288       if (proxy.get_lhs().handle() == this->handle())
00289       {
00290         viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_rhs().size());
00291         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00292         *this = result;
00293         return *this;
00294       }
00295       else
00296       {
00297         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00298         return *this;
00299       }
00300       return *this;
00301     }
00302 
00303     //v += A * x
00308     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00309     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00310     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00311     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+=(const vector_expression< const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00312                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00313                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00314     {
00315       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00316       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00317       *this += result;
00318       return *this;
00319     }
00320 
00325     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00326     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00327     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00328     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-=(const vector_expression< const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00329                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00330                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00331     {
00332       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00333       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00334       *this -= result;
00335       return *this;
00336     }

00339     //free functions:
00344     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00345     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00346     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00347     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+(const vector_expression< const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00348                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00349                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00350     {
00351       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00352       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00353       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00354       result += *this;
00355       return result;
00356     }

00362     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00363     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00364     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00365     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-(const vector_expression< const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00366                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00367                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00368     {
00369       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00370       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00371       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00372       result = *this - result;
00373       return result;
00374     }

00380     //v = trans(A) * x
00385     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00386     template <typename F, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00387     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00388     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator=(const viennacl::vector_expression< const transposed_matrix_proxy<SCALARTYPE, F, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00389                                                                                           const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00390                                                                                           viennacl::op_prod> & proxy) 
00391     {
00392       // check for the special case x = trans(A) * x
00393       if (proxy.get_lhs().get_matrix().handle() == this->handle())
00394       {
00395         viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_rhs().size());
00396         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00397         *this = result;
00398         return *this;
00399       }
00400       else
00401       {
00402         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00403         return *this;
00404       }
00405       return *this;
00406     }
